subject.geographic: The Development of the Industrial United States (1870-1900).

mods.note: A bill for $20.00 for 1 fine coffin and case. J. G. Swan made an oath before the Justice of the Peace, W. H. Lincoln, that the estate of Mrs. Ann Reeves owed him $20 for the coffin. A note at the bottom states that he received payment in full from the administrator of Mrs. Reeves` estate.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
